languages.text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds and removes all injuries. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can retarget attacking Psyker abilities through the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Raven.
The familiar's maximum Wounds are reduced by 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now also spends all available MP.

traits.locale_text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds and removes all injuries. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can retarget attacking Psyker abilities through the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Raven.
The familiar's maximum Wounds are reduced by 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now also spends all available MP.

languages.text:
The psyber-raven immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Псайберворон немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя надзиратель может {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслировать{/g} атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} с помощью своего псайберворона.
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} псайберворона сокращается на 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Перезапуск{/g} расходует все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} надзирателя.

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.

Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя надзиратель может {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}ретранслировать{/g} атакующие {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} с помощью своего псайберворона.

languages.text:
Der Psitech-Rabe regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Aufseher offensive {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} über seinen Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenken{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Psitech-Raben werden um -50 % reduziert. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} verbraucht jetzt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Aufsehers.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Rabe regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Aufseher offensive {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} über seinen Psitech-Raben {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenken{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Psitech-Raben werden um -50 % reduziert. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} verbraucht jetzt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Aufsehers.

languages.text:
La psyber-corneille régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même si elle n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la psyber-corneille peut {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayer{/g} les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} offensifs du surveillant.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} de la psyber-corneille sont réduites de −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Réactivation{/g} consomme désormais tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} du surveillant.
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La psyber-corneille régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même si elle n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la psyber-corneille peut {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relayer{/g} les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} offensifs du surveillant.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} de la psyber-corneille sont réduites de −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Réactivation{/g} consomme désormais tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} du surveillant.

languages.text:
完全恢复生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
监察官可以通过其生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}降低50%，{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}重新激活{/g}能力会消耗监察官所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
完全恢复生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
监察官可以通过其生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}攻击性{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}降低50%，{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}重新激活{/g}能力会消耗监察官所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
El psicocuervo recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} que sufra queda eliminado. Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, el supervisor puede {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitir{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de ataque mediante el psicocuervo.
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del psicocuervo se reducen un −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivación{/g} ahora consume todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del supervisor.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.

Cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} que sufra queda eliminado. Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, el supervisor puede {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitir{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de ataque mediante el psicocuervo.
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del psicocuervo se reducen un −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivación{/g} ahora consume todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del supervisor.

El psicocuervo recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, el supervisor puede {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmitir{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} de ataque mediante el psicocuervo.
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del psicocuervo se reducen un −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivación{/g} ahora consume todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del supervisor.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、監督官はサイバーレイヴンを通して攻撃超{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}能力{/g}を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}ことができる。
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が-50%低下する。{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}再起動{/g}は監督官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費する。
languages.original_text:
The psyber-raven immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、監督官はサイバーレイヴンを通して攻撃超{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}能力{/g}を{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}ことができる。
サイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が-50%低下する。{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}再起動{/g}は監督官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費する。

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun, anında iyileşerek tam {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığına{/g} kavuşur (sağlık puanı 0 olsa bile). Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in sonraki üç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Gözetmen, çatışma sonuna dek saldırı amaçlı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerini{/g} ruhsiber kuzgunu aracılığıyla {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktarabilir{/g}.
Ruhsiber kuzgunun {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı %50 azalır. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Yeniden Başlat{/g} artık Gözetmen'in tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini harcar.

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, the Overseer can {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relay{/g} attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} through their psyber-raven.
The psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
